name: Diluc
description: Diluc is the current owner of the Dawn Winery and a nobleman of high esteem in Mondstadt society.
longDescription: Diluc is the current owner of the Dawn Winery and a nobleman of high esteem in Mondstadt society. He is a gentleman who has inherited both the blood of the ancient nobles and the will of the people. He is also a famed businessman who has never forgotten his roots. Though a bit cold and brusque, he will protect Mondstadt at all costs.
